unit_rules.name: Bio-Stimulus
unit_rules.text: Friendly +Tyranids+ units within 6" have !Feel No Pain 6+!.

unit_rules.name: Feeding Frenzy
unit_rules.text: Melee attacks against units below starting strength have +1 to the Hit roll. Melee attacks against units below half strength also have +1 to the Wound roll.
